name: OpenAI Agents
description: OpenAI provides models with agentic strengths, a toolkit for agent creation and deploys, and dashboard features for monitoring and optimizing agents.

name: LangChain
description: LangChain is an open-source framework with a pre-built agent and tools to create and deploy AI applications.

name: CrewAI
description: CrewAI is an open-source framework for designing agents and orchestrating crews for automated workflows.

name: AutoGen
description: AutoGen is a programming framework for building applications using AI agents and facilitating cooperation among multiple agents.

name: Semantic Kernel
description: Semantic Kernel is a lightweight SDK that enables integration of AI with conventional programming languages.

name: LlamaIndex
description: LlamaIndex is a developer-first agent framework that accelerates the production of GenAI applications with trusted abstractions.

name: SuperAGI
description: SuperAGI is an open-source framework for building, managing, and running useful autonomous agents.
